blog.name: cityofaangels
blog.title: City of Angels
blog.description: Everything Marvel, Harry Potter and Disney/Pixar. I take Avengers prompts!

body:
ENDGAME SPOILERS INSIDE

Spoilers follow: beware!

Go

Away

If

You

Haven’t

Seen

The

Movie

Yet

I

Dont

Know

How

To

USe

Read

More

On

My

Phone

Last

Warning

That’s

It

Spoilers




I’m going to write a nice, long fix-it for Endgame. It’s mostly going to focus on Tony obviously because, hey, Tony. I’d like for it to be mostly happy with some angst; I plan to include some flashbacks of his life during the five years missing in Endgame + some happy scenes of the after.

So if any of you wants to see a scene included (like a wedding… Or Morgan’s birth (both will be in the fic)), drop me a message or an ask! I’ll do my best to include them.

I’m going to write a nice, long fix-it for Endgame. It’s mostly going to focus on Tony obviously because, hey, Tony. I’d like for it to be mostly happy with some angst; I plan to include some flashbacks of his life during the five years missing in Endgame + some happy scenes of the after.

So if any of you wants to see a scene included (like a wedding… Or Morgan’s birth (both will be in the fic)), drop me a message or an ask! I’ll do my best to include them.

summary: The most important rat in the universe  I saw Avengers Endgame this friday and it was great!! There were a few things I would...
body:
The most important rat in the universe

I saw Avengers Endgame this friday and it was great!! There were a few things I would have done differently but hey that’s what fanfics are for! So here it is a little fic with a different ending for endgame :) and a certain god of mischief

OBVIOUS WARNING, IF YOU HAVEN’T SEEN ENDGAME THERE ARE MAJOR SPOILERS SO BE WARNED

You had a family. You were fighting to keep this family safe. All these years ago when you first joined the Avengers you never imagine all these people would become the most important things in the world, and that you would be ready to die for them. But it hopefully wouldn’t come to that today seeing as you were currently winning. Tony had just snapped his fingers and Thanos and his army were slowly disappearing along with all your nightmares. Or so you thought.

“Mr Stark… we won… please… Tony…” you heard Peter say before breaking down in tears in Rhodey’s arms. You couldn’t comprehend what was happening until you saw Tony laying on the ground holding Pepper’s hand while she told him he could rest. You ran towards them just as Tony took his last breath.

“No no no Tony!” You cried “What are you doing?! I can bring him back!”

“(Y/N) it’s too dangerous, you could die” Rhodey said.

“I don’t care, I have to try” you said putting your hand on Tony’s arch reactor no longer glowing and closing your eyes.

You opened your eyes and looked around searching for Tony. You never liked coming here but it was necessary, you were the only one with a connection with “the other side”, the land of the dead. This always made you a freak, you could see the dead and travel to their world. Everyone treated you like an abomination, until you met Tony who took you to the Avengers compound where you discovered the true meaning of family, of love, this was ten years ago. Now here you were on the other side looking for the person who changed your life forever. You were strong but you never brought anyone back but you had to try. For Tony, for family, for love.

“(Y/N) what are you doing here?” You heard Tony say.

“What do you think? I’m here to bring you home” you said with a smirk.

“It’s too dangerous, I won’t let you”

“I’m not asking for you permission”

“(Y/N) I’m serious, I won’t let you die trying to save me. Just tell Pep and Morgan I love them”

“You can tell them yourself, now take my hand.” You said holding out your hand, but Tony wouldn’t take it. “Do you really think I’m going to let Morgan grow up fatherless? Tony, you changed my life, now it’s time for me to do something for you, I’m strong, I can do this I promise. Now take my hand” you said firmly.

Tony looked at you and hesitantly put his hand in yours. After that you both woke up in the normal world and took a deep breath like you had been drowning. You fell to your side into Peter’s arms.

“Tony! You’re alive!” Pepper said in tears before kissing her husband.

“(Y/N) are you okay??” Peter asked and they all looked at you.

“I have a massive headache but besides from that I’m peachy” you said chuckling.

“Thank you” Tony said looking deep into your eyes, you could see how grateful he felt, because that’s how you felt every single day.

“There is no need to thank me, I just did what you would have done” you answered with a smile before being pulled into an embrace with Pepper, Tony, Peter and Rhodey.

You were all outside Tony’s house, dressed in black, for Natasha and those who didn’t make it out of this terrible fight, looking at the lake. Everyone later went inside to talk about their fondest memories of their friend. You saw Clint and Wanda on the side near the lake and decided it was time to talk to them.

“I just wish I could tell her we won” Clint said. You put your hand on his shoulder.

“She knows. They both do” said Wanda

“Or you could tell them… when they come back..” you said hesitantly. The both looked at you wondering if you were playing a horrible prank, but you would never joke about something like this.

“I’ve been having trouble finding Nat, but that may be a good thing, it can mean she is still alive… and I have a pretty good idea of where she is and how to get her back”

“I swear (Y/N) if you’re fucking with me..” Clint said but you interrupted him.

“I’m not, I wouldn’t tell you if I wasn’t sure, I know how to get her back I just need to convince Steve” Clint looked at you with tears forming in the corner of his eyes. You had just given him hope… and if you were wrong, you would break his heart. But you were sure.

“And while I can’t talk to Vision because he wasn’t technically a human being I do have this” you said showing Wanda a little artifact you had in your back pocket. “It’s his conscious, all you need to do is make a body for it, and I know a certain princess from Wakanda who would be more than happy to help” you said handing her the artifact.

“I don’t know what to say… thanks you!” said Wanda with tears in her eyes

“Don’t thank me, it was Tony, all I did was put two and two together, now, go to talk to Shuri” you answered with a smile.

You watched her go before looking back towards the lake.

“So you really have a plan?” Clint asked

“I do, and it’s going to work, I promise” you said.

“You’re crazy (Y/N)” said Clint with a laugh “but God I love you, I’m so happy you’re part of this family of crazies” you both laughed before going in to join the others.

“Steve it’s gonna work just let me go with you” you said annoyingly

“And what if it doesn’t? What then? Will we ever be forgiven for giving them hope?” He answered raising his voice.

“That’s not the attitude Rogers” said Bucky “Not a lot of people know about this, only us three and Clint and Wanda and they won’t tell anyone in case we don’t succeed. And are you really telling me you don’t want to try? For once in your life listen to us and stop being so damn stubborn”

“Thanks Buck, couldn’t have said it better myself” you said crossing your hands over your chest “So are we going to put the stones and get our friend back or what?”

“Fine let’s go” Steve finally said.

You both mounted the platform a few hours later, all suited up with the suitcase containing the stones safely in hand. Bruce activated the devise and you looked at Buck and Sam smiling and said “See you in five seconds”

You and Steve were putting the stones back in the time you took them, deciding to leave the soul one for last, dreading to see if you could get Nat back. You only had the tesseract left and you were now in the military camp in 1970 dressed accordingly to blend in. As you passed the hallways, you saw a door with the name “Agent Carter”, Steve immediately stopped dead in his tracks. You knew what he was thinking and you pulled him into an empty room.

“I know what you want to do Steve, I overheard you and Bucky, you want to stay here… to have a life with Peggy” you said.

“(Y/N)… I.. “

“Hey I’m not trying to stop you I just want you to listen to what I have to say, then you can do what you want”

“Ok I’m listening” Steve said

“I know Bucky convinced you to do this, and I understand why you want to do it.” You took a deep breath “What I don’t understand is why… why you didn’t tell us… everyone.. me” you could feel tears trying to escape but fought them back “we would have supported you but you were ready to leave without saying goodbye, you were ready to leave your friends and family without a second glance. And while Bucky might be okay with this, I’m not.” Steve opened his lips to say something but you put your finger up motioning him to stay quiet.

“I’m not finished. Steve you are one of the most important people in my life, I am who I am today because of you and living without you would be fucking painful but what’s worst is living knowing I meant so little to you that I didn’t even deserve a goodbye”. There was a silence now that you were finished. You wanted to break sown and cry but managed to keep your cool and a single tear rolled down your cheeks.

Steve brushed his hand on your face to wipe away the tear.

“(Y/N).. I didn’t tell you because…. because if I had to say goodbye to you, I would stay, I didn’t tell you because you’re the only person who could convince me to stay, that’s how much you mean to me” he said with tears before hugging you. You both cried in each other’s arms pulling closer until you couldn’t breathe. When you broke apart you were so close you whispered in Steve’s ear “I have an idea…”

You were now on Vormir, to get Natasha back… alone. Steve had stayed behind, with Peggy to live a normal life like he wanted but you weren’t mad, like always you had a plan. You approached Red Scull and said firmly “the stone for a soul”

“(Y/L/N) come to bargain? You know it doesn’t work like that” he said with a laugh

“And you know I’m not leaving till I get my friend and correctly if I’m wrong but you need this stone, so just give me Natasha and we’ll be on our way”.

“(Y/N)?” You heard a familiar voice behind you.

“Nat!” You said running to hug her

“Now the stone, a deal is a deal” said Red Scull.

“Here it is” you said tossing the stone.

Nat and you both appeared on the platform of the machine. Bruce and Sam were both surprised to see Nat, wondering if they were dreaming. Bruce brought Natasha into a tight embrace as tears started running down both their faces.

“How did you do that??” Asked Sam

“I’m just talented” you answered with a laugh

“Hey where’s Steve? Did he forget something?”

“About that… Steve.. decided to stay in 1970 to have a life with Peggy”

“You can ask him yourself” interrupted Bucky pointing to a bench near the lake with an old man sitting on it.

Sam went to him and you stayed with Bucky.

“You knew” he said calmly

“Did you think I wouldn’t find out?”

“I knew you’d find out, I knew you would talk to him and say exactly the right thing, not before giving a proper tell off” Bucky said with a laugh

“Oh, that I did, made him cry even” you answered laughing.

“I’m gonna miss him” said Bucky

“Who said he’s leaving?” You said with a smirk

“Well he’s old.. wait what did you do?”

“Let’s just say I have more than one trick up my sleeve and that our beloved Captain is going to stick around for a while”

Sam approached you both holding the captain america shield in his hand. Bucky left to go talk to Steve, unable to understand what you had done. You watched him go a sneaky smile on your face.

“So how old are you now?” Asked Bucky with a grin

“Older than you, punk” answered Steve with a smile

“So… how was it? To have a life I mean”

“It was simple, repetitive, no monsters, no HYDRA, you could almost say it became boring” Steve and Bucky chuckled

“Was it what you always wanted?”

“It was, but it also wasn’t. I mean how great a life can be without a best friend to share it with?” Steve looked at Bucky who was sitting next to him and put his hand on top of his.

“I’m gonna miss you old man” Bucky said trying to keep the tears in the corner of his eyes.

“Old man yourself. And I would miss you too, if I was leaving but since I’m not, you’re stuck with me” Steve said with a smile.

“What do you mean, aren’t you dying soon? Wait does this have something to do with why (Y/N) was so happy?”

“It does, she came up with it actually, after yelling at me for while” they both chuckled “when we were trying out the suits we did something to Scott, so (Y/N) said if I wanted we could do the same to me when I was old”

“What on earth did you do to Scott?”

“Wait and see” answered Steve before getting up. Bucky took his arm and helped him reach the machine where (Y/N) was standing with Sam.

“Ready?” You asked.

“Ready” said old Steve as he activated the suit.

Whoosh. A few seconds later, he was back, but he wasn’t the same, he was the Steve you always knew, the ‘young’ Steve he was only 10 minutes ago.

“This is really confusing, did you just have an entire life, became old and then young again in the space of a few minutes?” Asked Sam.

“Time machine, baby!” You answered. You all laughed and hugged each other, this sure had been a long and crazy day for everyone.

All the avengers sat in the newly rebuilt compound, you were celebrating your win against Thanos and the return of all your loved ones. As you celebrated you noticed Thor standing in a corner drinking beer by himself, and you remembered, Loki was still dead. You had forgotten about the god of mischief with everything that had happened but he always did have a special place in your heart and you wanted to save him last to make sure it was possible, save the best for last. You approached Thor and gave him a smile before sitting next to him on a bar stool.

“Hello lady (Y/N), enjoying the celebrations?” He asked

“I am, but I can’t help but feel you’re not enjoying it yourself, maybe someone’s missing, I was sure we had invited everyone though. Hmmm I wonder who it could be..” you said trying to hide the grin forming on your face.

“What is this brother? Drinking alone instead of enjoying the party? That doesn’t sound like the Thor I know” said a familiar voice behind you.

“Loki!!” Said Thor before running to catch his brother in a tight embrace

“Now this is the Thor I remember” whispered Loki who was being held so tight he could barely breathe. “Although, you have let yourself go a little haven’t you?” He asked with a grin when they parted looking at his brother up and down.

“Only a little, but I have discovered the most amazing midgardian artifacts, I mist show you but before let me tell you about Mother, I saw her”

“You did??” Asked Loki eyes full of surprise.

You felt this was your cue to leave, so you left the too brothers to talk in peace and rejoined the party. You looked around and saw everyone was happy, no one was missing, as you looked around tears of happiness started forming in your eyes, and to say you might not have had this if Scott hasn’t escaped the quantum realm. Maybe entire life could change in a single second, like Tony deciding to go into the building where he found you and take you home, or Steve murmuring ‘Bucky’ to the winter soldier and thus bringing back his best friend, or simply a rat playing on the console of an abandoned car and pushing just the right button to reunite a family.


Feedback is always appreciated!!

“You can tell them yourself, now take my hand.” You said holding out your hand, but Tony wouldn’t take it. “Do you really think I’m going to let Morgan grow up fatherless? Tony, you changed my life, now it’s time for me to do something for you, I’m strong, I can do this I promise. Now take my hand” you said firmly.

Tony looked at you and hesitantly put his hand in yours. After that you both woke up in the normal world and took a deep breath like you had been drowning. You fell to your side into Peter’s arms.

“Tony! You’re alive!” Pepper said in tears before kissing her husband.

“(Y/N) are you okay??” Peter asked and they all looked at you.

“I have a massive headache but besides from that I’m peachy” you said chuckling.

“Thank you” Tony said looking deep into your eyes, you could see how grateful he felt, because that’s how you felt every single day.

“There is no need to thank me, I just did what you would have done” you answered with a smile before being pulled into an embrace with Pepper, Tony, Peter and Rhodey.

You were all outside Tony’s house, dressed in black, for Natasha and those who didn’t make it out of this terrible fight, looking at the lake. Everyone later went inside to talk about their fondest memories of their friend. You saw Clint and Wanda on the side near the lake and decided it was time to talk to them.

“I just wish I could tell her we won” Clint said. You put your hand on his shoulder.

“She knows. They both do” said Wanda

“Or you could tell them… when they come back..” you said hesitantly. The both looked at you wondering if you were playing a horrible prank, but you would never joke about something like this.

“I’ve been having trouble finding Nat, but that may be a good thing, it can mean she is still alive… and I have a pretty good idea of where she is and how to get her back”

“I swear (Y/N) if you’re fucking with me..” Clint said but you interrupted him.

“I’m not, I wouldn’t tell you if I wasn’t sure, I know how to get her back I just need to convince Steve” Clint looked at you with tears forming in the corner of his eyes. You had just given him hope… and if you were wrong, you would break his heart. But you were sure.

“And while I can’t talk to Vision because he wasn’t technically a human being I do have this” you said showing Wanda a little artifact you had in your back pocket. “It’s his conscious, all you need to do is make a body for it, and I know a certain princess from Wakanda who would be more than happy to help” you said handing her the artifact.

“I don’t know what to say… thanks you!” said Wanda with tears in her eyes

“Don’t thank me, it was Tony, all I did was put two and two together, now, go to talk to Shuri” you answered with a smile.

You watched her go before looking back towards the lake.

“So you really have a plan?” Clint asked

“I do, and it’s going to work, I promise” you said.

“You’re crazy (Y/N)” said Clint with a laugh “but God I love you, I’m so happy you’re part of this family of crazies” you both laughed before going in to join the others.

“Steve it’s gonna work just let me go with you” you said annoyingly

“And what if it doesn’t? What then? Will we ever be forgiven for giving them hope?” He answered raising his voice.

“That’s not the attitude Rogers” said Bucky “Not a lot of people know about this, only us three and Clint and Wanda and they won’t tell anyone in case we don’t succeed. And are you really telling me you don’t want to try? For once in your life listen to us and stop being so damn stubborn”

“Thanks Buck, couldn’t have said it better myself” you said crossing your hands over your chest “So are we going to put the stones and get our friend back or what?”

“Fine let’s go” Steve finally said.

You both mounted the platform a few hours later, all suited up with the suitcase containing the stones safely in hand. Bruce activated the devise and you looked at Buck and Sam smiling and said “See you in five seconds”

You and Steve were putting the stones back in the time you took them, deciding to leave the soul one for last, dreading to see if you could get Nat back. You only had the tesseract left and you were now in the military camp in 1970 dressed accordingly to blend in. As you passed the hallways, you saw a door with the name “Agent Carter”, Steve immediately stopped dead in his tracks. You knew what he was thinking and you pulled him into an empty room.

“I know what you want to do Steve, I overheard you and Bucky, you want to stay here… to have a life with Peggy” you said.

“(Y/N)… I.. “

“Hey I’m not trying to stop you I just want you to listen to what I have to say, then you can do what you want”

“Ok I’m listening” Steve said

“I know Bucky convinced you to do this, and I understand why you want to do it.” You took a deep breath “What I don’t understand is why… why you didn’t tell us… everyone.. me” you could feel tears trying to escape but fought them back “we would have supported you but you were ready to leave without saying goodbye, you were ready to leave your friends and family without a second glance. And while Bucky might be okay with this, I’m not.” Steve opened his lips to say something but you put your finger up motioning him to stay quiet.

“I’m not finished. Steve you are one of the most important people in my life, I am who I am today because of you and living without you would be fucking painful but what’s worst is living knowing I meant so little to you that I didn’t even deserve a goodbye”. There was a silence now that you were finished. You wanted to break sown and cry but managed to keep your cool and a single tear rolled down your cheeks.

Steve brushed his hand on your face to wipe away the tear.

“(Y/N).. I didn’t tell you because…. because if I had to say goodbye to you, I would stay, I didn’t tell you because you’re the only person who could convince me to stay, that’s how much you mean to me” he said with tears before hugging you. You both cried in each other’s arms pulling closer until you couldn’t breathe. When you broke apart you were so close you whispered in Steve’s ear “I have an idea…”

You were now on Vormir, to get Natasha back… alone. Steve had stayed behind, with Peggy to live a normal life like he wanted but you weren’t mad, like always you had a plan. You approached Red Scull and said firmly “the stone for a soul”

“(Y/L/N) come to bargain? You know it doesn’t work like that” he said with a laugh

“And you know I’m not leaving till I get my friend and correctly if I’m wrong but you need this stone, so just give me Natasha and we’ll be on our way”.

“(Y/N)?” You heard a familiar voice behind you.

“Nat!” You said running to hug her

“Now the stone, a deal is a deal” said Red Scull.

“Here it is” you said tossing the stone.

Nat and you both appeared on the platform of the machine. Bruce and Sam were both surprised to see Nat, wondering if they were dreaming. Bruce brought Natasha into a tight embrace as tears started running down both their faces.

“How did you do that??” Asked Sam

“I’m just talented” you answered with a laugh

“Hey where’s Steve? Did he forget something?”

“About that… Steve.. decided to stay in 1970 to have a life with Peggy”

“You can ask him yourself” interrupted Bucky pointing to a bench near the lake with an old man sitting on it.

Sam went to him and you stayed with Bucky.

“You knew” he said calmly

“Did you think I wouldn’t find out?”

“I knew you’d find out, I knew you would talk to him and say exactly the right thing, not before giving a proper tell off” Bucky said with a laugh

“Oh, that I did, made him cry even” you answered laughing.

“I’m gonna miss him” said Bucky

“Who said he’s leaving?” You said with a smirk

“Well he’s old.. wait what did you do?”

“Let’s just say I have more than one trick up my sleeve and that our beloved Captain is going to stick around for a while”

Sam approached you both holding the captain america shield in his hand. Bucky left to go talk to Steve, unable to understand what you had done. You watched him go a sneaky smile on your face.

“So how old are you now?” Asked Bucky with a grin

“Older than you, punk” answered Steve with a smile

“So… how was it? To have a life I mean”

“It was simple, repetitive, no monsters, no HYDRA, you could almost say it became boring” Steve and Bucky chuckled

“Was it what you always wanted?”

“It was, but it also wasn’t. I mean how great a life can be without a best friend to share it with?” Steve looked at Bucky who was sitting next to him and put his hand on top of his.

“I’m gonna miss you old man” Bucky said trying to keep the tears in the corner of his eyes.

“Old man yourself. And I would miss you too, if I was leaving but since I’m not, you’re stuck with me” Steve said with a smile.

“What do you mean, aren’t you dying soon? Wait does this have something to do with why (Y/N) was so happy?”

“It does, she came up with it actually, after yelling at me for while” they both chuckled “when we were trying out the suits we did something to Scott, so (Y/N) said if I wanted we could do the same to me when I was old”

“What on earth did you do to Scott?”

“Wait and see” answered Steve before getting up. Bucky took his arm and helped him reach the machine where (Y/N) was standing with Sam.

“Ready?” You asked.

“Ready” said old Steve as he activated the suit.

Whoosh. A few seconds later, he was back, but he wasn’t the same, he was the Steve you always knew, the ‘young’ Steve he was only 10 minutes ago.

“This is really confusing, did you just have an entire life, became old and then young again in the space of a few minutes?” Asked Sam.

“Time machine, baby!” You answered. You all laughed and hugged each other, this sure had been a long and crazy day for everyone.

All the avengers sat in the newly rebuilt compound, you were celebrating your win against Thanos and the return of all your loved ones. As you celebrated you noticed Thor standing in a corner drinking beer by himself, and you remembered, Loki was still dead. You had forgotten about the god of mischief with everything that had happened but he always did have a special place in your heart and you wanted to save him last to make sure it was possible, save the best for last. You approached Thor and gave him a smile before sitting next to him on a bar stool.

“Hello lady (Y/N), enjoying the celebrations?” He asked

“I am, but I can’t help but feel you’re not enjoying it yourself, maybe someone’s missing, I was sure we had invited everyone though. Hmmm I wonder who it could be..” you said trying to hide the grin forming on your face.

“What is this brother? Drinking alone instead of enjoying the party? That doesn’t sound like the Thor I know” said a familiar voice behind you.

“Loki!!” Said Thor before running to catch his brother in a tight embrace

“Now this is the Thor I remember” whispered Loki who was being held so tight he could barely breathe. “Although, you have let yourself go a little haven’t you?” He asked with a grin when they parted looking at his brother up and down.

“Only a little, but I have discovered the most amazing midgardian artifacts, I mist show you but before let me tell you about Mother, I saw her”

“You did??” Asked Loki eyes full of surprise.

You felt this was your cue to leave, so you left the too brothers to talk in peace and rejoined the party. You looked around and saw everyone was happy, no one was missing, as you looked around tears of happiness started forming in your eyes, and to say you might not have had this if Scott hasn’t escaped the quantum realm. Maybe entire life could change in a single second, like Tony deciding to go into the building where he found you and take you home, or Steve murmuring ‘Bucky’ to the winter soldier and thus bringing back his best friend, or simply a rat playing on the console of an abandoned car and pushing just the right button to reunite a family.


Feedback is always appreciated!!

The most important rat in the universe

I saw Avengers Endgame this friday and it was great!! There were a few things I would have done differently but hey that’s what fanfics are for! So here it is a little fic with a different ending for endgame :) and a certain god of mischief

OBVIOUS WARNING, IF YOU HAVEN’T SEEN ENDGAME THERE ARE MAJOR SPOILERS SO BE WARNED

[[MORE]]

You had a family. You were fighting to keep this family safe. All these years ago when you first joined the Avengers you never imagine all these people would become the most important things in the world, and that you would be ready to die for them. But it hopefully wouldn’t come to that today seeing as you were currently winning. Tony had just snapped his fingers and Thanos and his army were slowly disappearing along with all your nightmares. Or so you thought.

“Mr Stark… we won… please… Tony…” you heard Peter say before breaking down in tears in Rhodey’s arms. You couldn’t comprehend what was happening until you saw Tony laying on the ground holding Pepper’s hand while she told him he could rest. You ran towards them just as Tony took his last breath.

“No no no Tony!” You cried “What are you doing?! I can bring him back!”

“(Y/N) it’s too dangerous, you could die” Rhodey said.

“I don’t care, I have to try” you said putting your hand on Tony’s arch reactor no longer glowing and closing your eyes.

You opened your eyes and looked around searching for Tony. You never liked coming here but it was necessary, you were the only one with a connection with “the other side”, the land of the dead. This always made you a freak, you could see the dead and travel to their world. Everyone treated you like an abomination, until you met Tony who took you to the Avengers compound where you discovered the true meaning of family, of love, this was ten years ago. Now here you were on the other side looking for the person who changed your life forever. You were strong but you never brought anyone back but you had to try. For Tony, for family, for love.

“(Y/N) what are you doing here?” You heard Tony say.

“What do you think? I’m here to bring you home” you said with a smirk.

“It’s too dangerous, I won’t let you”

“I’m not asking for you permission”

“(Y/N) I’m serious, I won’t let you die trying to save me. Just tell Pep and Morgan I love them”

“You can tell them yourself, now take my hand.” You said holding out your hand, but Tony wouldn’t take it. “Do you really think I’m going to let Morgan grow up fatherless? “Tony! You’re alive!” Pepper said in tears before kissing her husband.

“I have a massive headache but besides from that I’m peachy” you said chuckling.

“Thank you” Tony said looking deep into your eyes, you could see how grateful he felt, because that’s how you felt every single day.

“There is no need to thank me, I just did what you would have done” you answered with a smile before being pulled into an embrace with Pepper, Tony, Peter and Rhodey.

You were all outside Tony’s house, dressed in black, for Natasha and those who didn’t make it out of this terrible fight, looking at the lake. “She knows. They both do” said Wanda

“I’ve been having trouble finding Nat, but that may be a good thing, it can mean she is still alive… and I have a pretty good idea of where she is and how to get her back”

“I swear (Y/N) if you’re fucking with me..” Clint said but you interrupted him.

“I’m not, I wouldn’t tell you if I wasn’t sure, I know how to get her back I just need to convince Steve” Clint looked at you with tears forming in the corner of his eyes. You had just given him hope… and if you were wrong, you would break his heart. But you were sure.

“And while I can’t talk to Vision because he wasn’t technically a human being I do have this” you said showing Wanda a little artifact you had in your back pocket. “It’s his conscious, all you need to do is make a body for it, and I know a certain princess from Wakanda who would be more than happy to help” you said handing her the artifact.

“I don’t know what to say… thanks you!” said Wanda with tears in her eyes

“Don’t thank me, it was Tony, all I did was put two and two together, now, go to talk to Shuri” you answered with a smile.

You watched her go before looking back towards the lake.

“So you really have a plan?” Clint asked

“I do, and it’s going to work, I promise” you said.

“You’re crazy (Y/N)” said Clint with a laugh “but God I love you, I’m so happy you’re part of this family of crazies” you both laughed before going in to join the others.

“Steve it’s gonna work just let me go with you” you said annoyingly

“And what if it doesn’t? What then? Will we ever be forgiven for giving them hope?” He answered raising his voice.

“That’s not the attitude Rogers” said Bucky “Not a lot of people know about this, only us three and Clint and Wanda and they won’t tell anyone in case we don’t succeed. And are you really telling me you don’t want to try? For once in your life listen to us and stop being so damn stubborn”

“Thanks Buck, couldn’t have said it better myself” you said crossing your hands over your chest “So are we going to put the stones and get our friend back or what?”

“Fine let’s go” Steve finally said.

You both cried in each other’s arms pulling closer until you couldn’t breathe. When you broke apart you were so close you whispered in Steve’s ear “I have an idea…”

“And you know I’m not leaving till I get my friend and correctly if I’m wrong but you need this stone, so just give me Natasha and we’ll be on our way”.

“Nat!” You said running to hug her

“Now the stone, a deal is a deal” said Red Scull.

“You knew” he said calmly

“Did you think I wouldn’t find out?”

“I knew you’d find out, I knew you would talk to him and say exactly the right thing, not before giving a proper tell off” Bucky said with a laugh

“Oh, that I did, made him cry even” you answered laughing.

“Old man yourself. And I would miss you too, if I was leaving but since I’m not, you’re stuck with me” Steve said with a smile.

“And while I can’t talk to Vision because he wasn’t technically a human being I do have this” you said showing Wanda a little artifact you had in your back pocket. “It’s his conscious, all you need to do is make a body for it, and I know a certain princess from Wakanda who would be more than happy to help” you said handing her the artifact.

“I don’t know what to say… thanks you!” said Wanda with tears in her eyes

“Don’t thank me, it was Tony, all I did was put two and two together, now, go to talk to Shuri” you answered with a smile.

You watched her go before looking back towards the lake.

“So you really have a plan?” Clint asked

“I do, and it’s going to work, I promise” you said.

“You’re crazy (Y/N)” said Clint with a laugh “but God I love you, I’m so happy you’re part of this family of crazies” you both laughed before going in to join the others.

“Steve it’s gonna work just let me go with you” you said annoyingly

“And what if it doesn’t? What then? Will we ever be forgiven for giving them hope?” He answered raising his voice.

“That’s not the attitude Rogers” said Bucky “Not a lot of people know about this, only us three and Clint and Wanda and they won’t tell anyone in case we don’t succeed. And are you really telling me you don’t want to try? For once in your life listen to us and stop being so damn stubborn”

“Thanks Buck, couldn’t have said it better myself” you said crossing your hands over your chest “So are we going to put the stones and get our friend back or what?”

“Fine let’s go” Steve finally said.

You both mounted the platform a few hours later, all suited up with the suitcase containing the stones safely in hand. Bruce activated the devise and you looked at Buck and Sam smiling and said “See you in five seconds”

You and Steve were putting the stones back in the time you took them, deciding to leave the soul one for last, dreading to see if you could get Nat back. You only had the tesseract left and you were now in the military camp in 1970 dressed accordingly to blend in. As you passed the hallways, you saw a door with the name “Agent Carter”, Steve immediately stopped dead in his tracks. You knew what he was thinking and you pulled him into an empty room.

“I know what you want to do Steve, I overheard you and Bucky, you want to stay here… to have a life with Peggy” you said.

“(Y/N)… I.. “

“Hey I’m not trying to stop you I just want you to listen to what I have to say, then you can do what you want”

“Ok I’m listening” Steve said

“I know Bucky convinced you to do this, and I understand why you want to do it.” You took a deep breath “What I don’t understand is why… why you didn’t tell us… everyone.. me” you could feel tears trying to escape but fought them back “we would have supported you but you were ready to leave without saying goodbye, you were ready to leave your friends and family without a second glance. And while Bucky might be okay with this, I’m not.” Steve opened his lips to say something but you put your finger up motioning him to stay quiet.

“I’m not finished. Steve you are one of the most important people in my life, I am who I am today because of you and living without you would be fucking painful but what’s worst is living knowing I meant so little to you that I didn’t even deserve a goodbye”. There was a silence now that you were finished. You wanted to break sown and cry but managed to keep your cool and a single tear rolled down your cheeks.

Steve brushed his hand on your face to wipe away the tear.

“(Y/N).. I didn’t tell you because…. because if I had to say goodbye to you, I would stay, I didn’t tell you because you’re the only person who could convince me to stay, that’s how much you mean to me” he said with tears before hugging you. You both cried in each other’s arms pulling closer until you couldn’t breathe. When you broke apart you were so close you whispered in Steve’s ear “I have an idea…”

You were now on Vormir, to get Natasha back… alone. Steve had stayed behind, with Peggy to live a normal life like he wanted but you weren’t mad, like always you had a plan. You approached Red Scull and said firmly “the stone for a soul”

“(Y/L/N) come to bargain? You know it doesn’t work like that” he said with a laugh

“And you know I’m not leaving till I get my friend and correctly if I’m wrong but you need this stone, so just give me Natasha and we’ll be on our way”.

“(Y/N)?” You heard a familiar voice behind you.

“Nat!” You said running to hug her

“Now the stone, a deal is a deal” said Red Scull.

“Here it is” you said tossing the stone.

Nat and you both appeared on the platform of the machine. Bruce and Sam were both surprised to see Nat, wondering if they were dreaming. Bruce brought Natasha into a tight embrace as tears started running down both their faces.

“How did you do that??” Asked Sam

“I’m just talented” you answered with a laugh

“Hey where’s Steve? Did he forget something?”

“About that… Steve.. decided to stay in 1970 to have a life with Peggy”

“You can ask him yourself” interrupted Bucky pointing to a bench near the lake with an old man sitting on it.

Sam went to him and you stayed with Bucky.

“You knew” he said calmly

“Did you think I wouldn’t find out?”

“I knew you’d find out, I knew you would talk to him and say exactly the right thing, not before giving a proper tell off” Bucky said with a laugh

“Oh, that I did, made him cry even” you answered laughing.

“I’m gonna miss him” said Bucky

“Who said he’s leaving?” You said with a smirk

“Well he’s old.. wait what did you do?”

“Let’s just say I have more than one trick up my sleeve and that our beloved Captain is going to stick around for a while”

Sam approached you both holding the captain america shield in his hand. Bucky left to go talk to Steve, unable to understand what you had done. You watched him go a sneaky smile on your face.

“So how old are you now?” Asked Bucky with a grin

“Older than you, punk” answered Steve with a smile

“So… how was it? To have a life I mean”

“It was simple, repetitive, no monsters, no HYDRA, you could almost say it became boring” Steve and Bucky chuckled

“Was it what you always wanted?”

“It was, but it also wasn’t. I mean how great a life can be without a best friend to share it with?” Steve looked at Bucky who was sitting next to him and put his hand on top of his.

“I’m gonna miss you old man” Bucky said trying to keep the tears in the corner of his eyes.

“Old man yourself. And I would miss you too, if I was leaving but since I’m not, you’re stuck with me” Steve said with a smile.

“What do you mean, aren’t you dying soon? Wait does this have something to do with why (Y/N) was so happy?”

“It does, she came up with it actually, after yelling at me for while” they both chuckled “when we were trying out the suits we did something to Scott, so (Y/N) said if I wanted we could do the same to me when I was old”

“What on earth did you do to Scott?”

“Wait and see” answered Steve before getting up. Bucky took his arm and helped him reach the machine where (Y/N) was standing with Sam.

“Ready?” You asked.

“Ready” said old Steve as he activated the suit.

Whoosh. A few seconds later, he was back, but he wasn’t the same, he was the Steve you always knew, the ‘young’ Steve he was only 10 minutes ago.

“This is really confusing, did you just have an entire life, became old and then young again in the space of a few minutes?” Asked Sam.

“Time machine, baby!” You answered. You all laughed and hugged each other, this sure had been a long and crazy day for everyone.

All the avengers sat in the newly rebuilt compound, you were celebrating your win against Thanos and the return of all your loved ones. As you celebrated you noticed Thor standing in a corner drinking beer by himself, and you remembered, Loki was still dead. You had forgotten about the god of mischief with everything that had happened but he always did have a special place in your heart and you wanted to save him last to make sure it was possible, save the best for last. You approached Thor and gave him a smile before sitting next to him on a bar stool.

“Hello lady (Y/N), enjoying the celebrations?” He asked

“I am, but I can’t help but feel you’re not enjoying it yourself, maybe someone’s missing, I was sure we had invited everyone though. Hmmm I wonder who it could be..” you said trying to hide the grin forming on your face.

“What is this brother? Drinking alone instead of enjoying the party? That doesn’t sound like the Thor I know” said a familiar voice behind you.

“Loki!!” Said Thor before running to catch his brother in a tight embrace

“Now this is the Thor I remember” whispered Loki who was being held so tight he could barely breathe. “Although, you have let yourself go a little haven’t you?” He asked with a grin when they parted looking at his brother up and down.

“Only a little, but I have discovered the most amazing midgardian artifacts, I mist show you but before let me tell you about Mother, I saw her”

“You did??” Asked Loki eyes full of surprise.

You felt this was your cue to leave, so you left the too brothers to talk in peace and rejoined the party. You looked around and saw everyone was happy, no one was missing, as you looked around tears of happiness started forming in your eyes, and to say you might not have had this if Scott hasn’t escaped the quantum realm. Maybe entire life could change in a single second, like Tony deciding to go into the building where he found you and take you home, or Steve murmuring ‘Bucky’ to the winter soldier and thus bringing back his best friend, or simply a rat playing on the console of an abandoned car and pushing just the right button to reunite a family.


Feedback is always appreciated!!
trail.content_abstract:
The most important rat in the universe

I saw Avengers Endgame this friday and it was great!! There were a few things I would have done differently but hey that’s what fanfics are for! So here it is a little fic with a different ending for endgame :) and a certain god of mischief

OBVIOUS WARNING, IF YOU HAVEN’T SEEN ENDGAME THERE ARE MAJOR SPOILERS SO BE WARNED

summary: SPOILERS: Endgame has left me so conflicted I’m having an aneurysm
title: SPOILERS: Endgame has left me so conflicted I’m having an aneurysm
body:
Can y’all just imagine Steve growing old and shit with Peggy, and somehow he just knows what’s going to happen in the future? Like he’d be sitting in a theater with her and knowing exactly how Star Wars is gonna go, or Peggy talking to a colleague in SHIELD and he’d figure out the person was HYDRA or something like how is THAT supposed to work?? How many secrets will he keep? Is he actually going to turn a blind eye when he knows what he knows? 

In the timeline we have now, Cap couldn’t have been at the battle of New York where his leadership was crucial. Should we just assume that nothing changed?

Also how awkward would it be when he meets little Sharon Carter and becomes her great uncle yIKES
